attributes.action: Allow Driving lessons / tests in England for NHS and key workers
attributes.additional_details: We like the DVSA to reinstate emergency driving tests for NHS and key workers who have had their tests cancelled which means they must continue putting themselves at risk using public transport and creates difficulties in travelling to work at unsociable hours.
attributes.background: Allow driving lessons and emergency driving tests for NHS and Key workers who have had driving tests cancelled due to national lockdown.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566844
